catList: After a review of the previous level, more sophisticated language activities and skills are introduced. Body language is a new component. The students are expected to produce more detailed descriptions of physical and psychological states. The course aims at improving the students' ability to follow transitions between tenses, use linking words and gain the ability to narrate a story effectively. Error correction at sentence level is encouraged.  Debates and discussions are part of the course. The students will read a book of advanced level and the tasks related to reading will be more sophisticated.

After a review of the previous level, more sophisticated language activities and skills are introduced. Body language is a new component. The students are expected to produce more detailed descriptions of physical and psychological states. The course also aims at improving the students' ability to narrate a story using linking words. Sentence- level error correction, debates and discussions are part of the course. Students carry out Intermediate level reading activities and tasks.
